Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Absorber:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Absorber:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Absorber:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !Absorber:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

Absorber:BloodyFeather.NAME: Bloody Feather
Absorber:BloodyFeather.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage(increases by !M! per turn) exhaust

Absorber:KneeStrike.NAME: Stim Needle
Absorber:KneeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage gain !M! mana and !M! extra cards next turn

Absorber:DrainDamage.NAME: Drain Damage
Absorber:DrainDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !Absorber:DrainVariable! 2*X damage where X is the amount of drain done this combat

Absorber:DrainLash.NAME: Drain Lash
Absorber:DrainLash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you drain, deal !M! damage to all enemies

Absorber:HealthDrain.NAME: Health Drain
Absorber:HealthDrain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP on your Turn, drain !Absorber:DrainVariable!

Absorber:ChosenAttack.NAME: Chosen Attack
Absorber:ChosenAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is not attacking, gain !M! artifact

Absorber:GremlinRally.NAME: Gremlin Rally
Absorber:GremlinRally.DESCRIPTION: Add a Gremlin Stab to your hand at the beginning of each turn
Absorber:GremlinRally.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Gremlin Stab to your hand at the beginning of each turn

Absorber:LagavulinDrain.NAME: Lagavulin Drain
Absorber:LagavulinDrain.DESCRIPTION: Drain X, Drain X strength from target Exhaust
Absorber:LagavulinDrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Drain X+1, Drain X+1 strength from target Exhaust

Absorber:LooterDagger.NAME: Looter Dagger
Absorber:LooterDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If any damage is unblocked, Gain !D! gold

Absorber:Harden.NAME: Harden
Absorber:Harden.DESCRIPTION: The first time you take damage each turn, Gain 6 block

Absorber:PrepareOperation.NAME: Prepare Operation
Absorber:PrepareOperation.DESCRIPTION: Next Turn, Gain !B! Block and !M! Energy

Absorber:OrbSpray.NAME: Orb Spray
Absorber:OrbSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! (!M! damage per turn) to all enemies

Absorber:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Absorber:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn

Absorber:StabbingBook.NAME: Stabbing Book
Absorber:StabbingBook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! (number of turns) times exhaust

Absorber:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Absorber:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and retain !M! card(s) this turn

Absorber:VolatileSteroid.NAME: Volatile Steroid
Absorber:VolatileSteroid.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Take another turn after this one exhaust

Absorber:LifeSupport.NAME: Life Support
Absorber:LifeSupport.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the Turn, Drain !Absorber:DrainVariable! from all enemies

Absorber:BloodTransfusion.NAME: Blood Transfusion
Absorber:BloodTransfusion.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage, Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! temp Strength and !Absorber:SecondMagic! temp Dexterity

Absorber:ForcedBloodTransfusion.NAME: Forced Transfusion
Absorber:ForcedBloodTransfusion.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage, Apply !Absorber:SecondMagic! weak and !Absorber:SecondMagic! vulnerable to each enemy

Absorber:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
Absorber:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Buff Each Attack in your hand by !M! Damage

Absorber:NeverEndingWall.NAME: Never Ending Wall
Absorber:NeverEndingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Absorber:WallDefend! Block, increase this amount for all Never Ending Walls by !M! this combat

Absorber:Crystallize.NAME: Crystallize
Absorber:Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, deal double damage next turn, end you turn exhaust

Absorber:BeatDown.NAME: BeatDown
Absorber:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Enemy loses !M! strength for the rest of the turn

Absorber:GremlinArmy.NAME: Gremlin Army
Absorber:GremlinArmy.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Gremlin Stabs to your hand next turn

Absorber:SentrySlam.NAME: Sentry Slam
Absorber:SentrySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, deals double damage on odd turns

Absorber:WideSwing.NAME: Wide Swing
Absorber:WideSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !Absorber:DrainVariable! drain from all enemies
